oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.util

Class SpatialIndexUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.util.SpatialIndexUtils

  • public class SpatialIndexUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains convenient methods used internally by the vector API for generating and reading spatial index metadata
    Author:
    hsaucedo

        public static SpatialIndexMetadata findSpatialIndexMetadata(java.lang.String indexName,
                                                            Path metadataDirPath,
                                                            Configuration conf)
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Searches the metadata file for the given index name
        Parameters:
        indexName - a spatial index name
        metadataDirPath - the metadata directory
        conf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        the spatial index metadata bean if the metadata was found or null
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
